tr.td:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

td.div: English: Shows the kernel's role in a computer.

tr.td: The source code of this SVG is valid.
This diagram was created with a text editor.
This SVG diagram uses embedded text that can be easily translated using a text editor.

to remix – to adapt the work

tr.td: Shows the role of the kernel in a modern computer and where it lies in relation to Hardware and User Applications Category:Computer Category:Operating system kernels

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:52, 16 July 2008

tr.td: {{Information |Description={{en|1=Shows the kernels role in a computer.}} |Source=Own work by uploader |Author=Bobbo |Date=July 16 2008 |Permission= |other_versions=http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Image:Kernel.png }} {{ImageUpload|full}}
